articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Wales cut Wallaby lead, Ireland extend advantage v SA
articles.description: Watch, listen and follow live text as Wales host Australia and Ireland face South Africa after wins for England and Scotland.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Bottas on pole as Hamilton crashes
articles.description: Live text and 5 live sports extra coverage of Brazilian GP qualifying, where Lewis Hamilton has crashed on his first lap.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Brazilian Grand Prix: F1 'needs to do more' to keep teams safe, says Lewis Hamilton
articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says Formula 1 'needs to do more' after members of his Mercedes team were robbed at gunpoint in Sao Paulo on Friday night.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Autumn international: Scotland 44-38 Samoa
articles.description: Scotland withstand a second-half Samoa fightback to open their autumn account with a try-filled victory at Murrayfield.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: African Footballer of the Year - who will be on the shortlist?
articles.description: Who will be shortlisted for the 2017 African Footballer of the Year award? Follow live text coverage here to find out.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Women's Ashes 2017: Ellyse Perry hits record double century as Australia dominate England
articles.description: Ellyse Perry becomes only the seventh woman to hit a Test double century as Australia take control of the Women's Ashes Test against England.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Lewis Hamilton crashes in Brazilian GP qualifying as Valtteri Bottas takes pole
articles.description: Lewis Hamilton starts from the back of the Brazilian GP grid following a crash, as team-mate Valtteri Bottas takes pole.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Autumn international: England 21-8 Argentina
articles.description: England open their autumn Tests campaign with a workmanlike win over Argentina in an uninspiring match at Twickenham.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Trampoline World Championships: Kristof Willerton secures gold for British tumbling team
articles.description: Great Britain's Kristof Willerton secures men's tumbling team gold at the Trampoline World Championships in Sochi, finishing above China and Denmark.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: The cosplaying cage fighter
articles.description: One of the world's best female fighters is also a self-confessed "dork" who likes making costumes.
